Selected Publications

  • Latent Variable Model for Multi-modal Translation (paper accepted)
    Iacer Calixto, Miguel Rios, Wilker Aziz. In: Proceedings of the 57th Annual Meeting of the Association for Computational Linguistics (Volume 1: Long Papers), 2019.
  • An Error Analysis for Image-Based Multi-Modal Neural Machine Translation
    Iacer Calixto, Qun Liu. Machine Translation: Special Issue in Human Factors in Neural Machine Translation, 2019.
  • Linguistic realisation as machine translation: Comparing different MT models for AMR-to-text generation
    Thiago Castro Ferreira, Iacer Calixto, Sander Wubben and Emiel Krahmer. In: Proceedings of The 10th International Natural Language Generation conference, 2017.
  • Human Evaluation of Multi-modal Neural Machine Translation: A Case-Study on E-Commerce Listing Titles
    Iacer Calixto, Daniel Stein, Evgeny Matusov, Sheila Castilho, Andy Way. In: Proceedings of the 6th Workshop on Vision and Language, 2017.
  • Sentence-Level Multilingual Multi-modal Embedding for Natural Language Processing
    Iacer Calixto, Qun Liu. In: Proceedings of Recent Advances in Natural Language Processing, 2017.
  • Doubly-Attentive Decoder for Multi-modal Neural Machine Translation
    Iacer Calixto, Qun Liu, Nick Campbell. In: Proceedings of the 55th Annual Meeting of the Association for Computational Linguistics (Volume 1: Long Papers), 2017.
  • Using Images to Improve Machine-Translating E-Commerce Product Listings
    Iacer Calixto, Daniel Stein, Evgeny Matusov, Pintu Lohar, Sheila Castilho, Andy Way. In: Proceedings of the 15th Conference of the European Chapter of the Association for Computational Linguistics: Volume 2, Short Papers, 2017.
  • Incorporating Global Visual Features into Attention-Based Neural Machine Translation
    Iacer Calixto, Qun Liu. In: Proceedings of the 2017 Conference on Empirical Methods in Natural Language Processing, 2017.
  • Is Neural Machine Translation the New State-of-the-Art?
    Sheila Castilho, Joss Moorkens, Federico Gaspari, Iacer Calixto, John Tinsley, Andy Way. The Prague Bulletin of Mathematical Linguistics, 2017.
  • Developing a Dataset for Evaluating Approaches for Document Expansion with Images
    Debasis Ganguly, Iacer Calixto, Gareth Jones. In: Proceedings of the Tenth International Conference on Language Resources and Evaluation, 2016.
  • DCU–UvA Multimodal MT System Report
    Iacer Calixto, Desmond Elliott, Stella Frank. In: The First Conference on Machine Translation, 2016.
  • Multimodal neural machine translation using minimum risk training
    Chris Hokamp, Iacer Calixto. In: The First Conference on Machine Translation, 2016.
  • Automatic Text Simplification for Spanish: Comparative Evaluation of Various Simplification Strategies
    Sanja Stajner, Iacer Calixto, Horacio Saggion. In: Proceedings of Recent Advances in Natural Language Processing, 2015.
  • Target-Centric Features for Translation Quality Estimation
    Chris Hokamp, Iacer Calixto, Joachim Wagner, Jian Zhang. In: The Workshop on Statistical Machine Translation, 2014.
  • Experiments in Medical Translation Shared Task at WMT 2014
    Jian Zhang, Xiaofeng Wu, Iacer Calixto, Ali Vahid, Andy Way, Qun Liu. In: Proceedings of the ACL 2014 Ninth Workshop of Statistical Machine Translation, 2014.
  • A fuzzy set based approach to origin-destination matrix estimation in urban traffic networks with imprecise data
    Les Foulds, Hugo do Nascimento, Iacer Calixto, Bryon Hall, Humberto Longo. The European Journal of Operations Research, 2013.
  • Images as context in Statistical Machine Translation
    Iacer Calixto, Lucia Specia, Teófilo de Campos. In: The Workshop on Vision and Language, 2012.
  • A fuzzy set approach to estimating OD matrices in congested Brazilian traffic networks
    Leslie Foulds, Hugo do Nascimento, Iacer Calixto, Bryon Hall, Humberto Longo. In: Anais do XLIII Encontro da Sociedade Brasileira de Pesquisa Operacional., 2012.
